header_text: For the first time, you're taking part in a research study about HD. When someone tells you that you've been picked as a participant, you don't know what to expect. As you think about it more, you begin to feel uneasy.

elements.text: For the first time, you're taking part in a research study about PD. When someone tells you that you've been picked as a participant, you don't know what to expect. As you think about it more, you begin to feel...
